item.title: Flex UGC Codes (April 2025)
item.description:
Flex UGC is a Roblox experience for buying UGC. You won't find game content here, as it's a marketplace where you can sell, trade, and buy items. Creators usually make packs of items and sell them. If you buy certain items, you can redeem codes and get more freebies. You can find Flex UGC codes in the list below.

Updated April 12, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: Flex UGC has new rewards available, giving you access to unique in-game items.вв Some of these items might only be available for a limited time, so be sure to claim them while you can. Keep checking back for future updates and more customization options.

All Flex UGC Codes

How to Redeem Codes in Flex UGC

In many Roblox games, it is easy to redeem codes. The same applies to Flex UGC . When you enter the experience, the option to redeem codes is literally the first thing you will see. Nevertheless, if you need a hint, you can use our guide below, in which we explain how to redeem codes in Flex UGC .

  • Open Roblox and launch Flex UGC .
  • After loading, you will immediately see a window. Click the Redeem a Code button.
  • In the field, paste the code from the list of working codes and click Redeem.

Remember that codes in Flex UGC can quickly expire, and it depends on many factors. Item creators may restrict access for some reason or simply run out of copies of the items. Therefore, redeem codes as soon as possible while you can.

How to get More Flex UGC Codes

There are many Roblox codes for Flex UGC and they are easy to find. They're posted on the board to the right of the spawn point, so you can look for them yourself. You can also use this guide too. We update it regularly so that you get the latest codes.

item.description:
Quick Links

  • All Fruit Battlegrounds Codes
  • How to Redeem Codes in Fruit Battlegrounds
  • Fruit Battlegrounds Tips & Tricks
  • Best Roblox Adventure Games Like Fruit Battlegrounds

Fruit Battlegrounds is an incredibly fun Roblox game with cool animations and a ton of abilities that can be used in action battles with other players. Codes are an integral part of almost any Roblox game, and Fruit Battlegrounds is no exception. They provide gems that can be very useful during gameplay, so fans of the game should feel free to scroll down and redeem these Fruit Battlegrounds codes while they are still active.

Updated April 12, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: Fruit Battlegrounds has fresh rewards available, giving you a boost in gems to enhance your gameplay. Codes update frequently, so it's worth checking back regularly. Don't miss out on the latest opportunities to power up your adventure.

How to Redeem Codes in Fruit Battlegrounds

Players should follow the few steps mentioned below and claim codes for free:

  1. Open Roblox and launch Fruit Battlegrounds
  2. Choose the option Spin Fruit to enter the store.
  3. Click on the chest.
  4. In the screen’s bottom-left corner, you can see the special window for redeeming codes.
  5. Paste the code here and click the Redeem button. Codes will automatically store rewards on the account.

Fruit Battlegrounds Tips & Tricks

Spin Wisely

Players should use gems to spin for fruits and take advantage of the codes provided above to increase their gems count. They'll also want to save and equip rare or legendary fruits for better gameplay.

Use Feature

After 100 spins, players will be guaranteed good fruit. As such, they should keep spinning to make the most of this feature.

Level up efficiently

Using moves repeatedly will lead to them leveling up. Players can either fight other players or use their moves strategically to gain experience points.

Daily rewards

Players should log in daily to collect gems from the daily rewards feature.

Best Roblox Adventure Games Like Fruit Battlegrounds

Eventually, all games get boring or run out of content. In this case, finding new games is a necessity. Therefore, if players want a similar gaming experience, they can find five games like Fruit Battlegrounds listed below:

  • Dragon Race
  • Your Bizarre Adventure
  • Dragon Blox
  • Dragon Warrior Simulator
  • Dragons' Life

item.title: Assassin's Creed Shadows Update Makes PS5 Pro Version Even Better
item.description:
Summary

  • Title Update 1.0.2 for Assassin's Creed Shadows adds even more PS5 Pro enhancements.
  • Ray-traced reflections in Quality and Balanced Modes further improve realism across all modes.
  • PSSR support across all modes enhances image quality and reduces GPU load on PS5 Pro.

Assassin's Creed Shadows' latest update has introduced two new lighting technologies and an AI-driven upscaler for the PS5 Pro version. These enhancements can boost GPU efficiency by up to 300% while improving visuals across Assassin's Creed Shadows' Performance, Quality, and Fidelity modes.

AC Shadows has already received praise for its polished visuals and stable performance on both PC and consoles. However, it seems the developers used the extra time between the launch delay and global release to further optimize the game for Sony's advanced PS5 Pro. The new Title Update, v1.0.2, makes Shadows' PS5 Pro edition the "ultimate console version," one that "rivals ultra-high-end gaming PCs."

Title Update 1.0.2 improves AC Shadows on the PS5 Pro in three key ways: it adds ray-traced global illumination to Performance Mode, introduces ray-traced reflections in Quality and Balanced Modes, and leverages the console's built-in PSSR technology for AI-driven upscaling. In simple terms, the update brings advanced real-time lighting to Performance Mode, calculates more detailed reflections across all modes, and uses AI to upscale visuals while reducing GPU load without lowering image quality.

AC Shadows' Latest Update Improves Its Performance on the PS5 Pro

  • Ray-traced global illumination in Performance Mode (versus the pre-baked global illumination on the standard PS5.)
  • Ray-traced reflections in Quality and Balanced Mode (complimentary with the ray-traced global illumination present on standard PS5.)
  • PSSR Support on all modes. (It needs to be manually enabled from the video tab of the options menu.)

Ray-traced global illumination (RTGI) is a newer technology that allows light to react dynamically to the game's environments, creating more natural and realistic lighting. In contrast, older methods like pre-baked global illumination rely on predicted lighting behavior, often resulting in static and less convincing visuals. Ray-traced reflections also improve realism by allowing reflective surfaces to display objects even outside the player's view. To put it in perspective, some of the earlier Assassin's Creed games used techniques like Screen Space Local Reflections (SSLR), which could only reflect objects visible on the screen, struggling to create realistic reflective surfaces like water, metal, etc.

According to the developers of AC Shadows, who detailed the update in a PlayStation blog post, the latest patch's advancements are made possible by the PS5 Pro's advanced firmware. They also credit the success of Title Update 1.0.2 to the console's faster GPU, support for BVH8 (a new ray-tracing technology), and the PlayStation Spectral Super Resolution (PSSR) upscaling system.

10 Images
10 Images

PHYSICAL

Experience an epic historical action-adventure story set in feudal Japan! Become a lethal shinobi Assassin and a powerful legendary samurai as you explore a beautiful open world in a time of chaos. Switch seamlessly between two unlikely allies as you discover their common destiny. Master complementary playstyles, create your shinobi league, customize your hideout, and usher in a new era for Japan.

• Explore the captivating open world of feudal Japan, from spectacular castle towns and bustling ports to peaceful shrines and war-ravaged landscapes. Adventure through unpredictable weather, changing seasons, and reactive environments.
• Become Naoe, a shinobi Assassin, and Yasuke, a legendary samurai, as you experience their riveting stories and master their complementary playstyles. As Naoe, use stealth to avoid detection and agility to confound your enemies. As Yasuke, strike your foes with lethal precision and power. Unlock new skills, gear, and progression independently for each character.
• Make information your weapon as you explore the world, and build your own network of spies to be your eyes and ears across locations to hunt down your next target. Along the way, recruit new allies with unique abilities to help accomplish your missions.
• Create a fully customizable hideout for your growing shinobi league as you train your crew, craft new gear, interact with key characters, and choose your base’s layout, decorations, and accessories.

item.title: Mass Effect 4: Predicting What the Geth's Role May Be
item.description:
There's a strong air of mystery swirling around the next Mass Effect , and that will likely continue to be the case for some time yet. The long-awaited continuation of the Mass Effect franchise has a lot of promise, as the original trilogy is regularly cited as one of the best science-fiction franchises of all time, and not just within the gaming medium. Indeed, Mass Effect 's worldbuilding can go toe-to-toe with the likes of Star Trek and Battlestar Galactica , and much of these lore strengths can be attributed to its vast array of diverse alien cultures.

One of the more intriguing alien races of the Mass Effect franchise is the Geth, a synthetic hivemind initially devised as a sort of automaton slave caste by the Quarians. Upon achieving self-awareness and devising intrinsic goals for themselves, the Geth went to war with the Quarians to achieve their freedom, and this conflict sparked a long-lasting animosity between the two civilizations. The Geth's reputation wasn't helped by the emergence of the Heretics, a splinter group that chose to side with Saren and the Reapers during the events of Mass Effect 1 . But over the course of the series, Commander Shepard comes to learn that the Geth aren't explicitly good or bad, but simply an unprecedented form of artificial life, complicating their role in the story significantly.

How the Geth Could Show Up In the Next Mass Effect

Option 1: Mass Effect 3's Destroy Ending

So much speculation about Mass Effect 4 surrounds whether or not Shepard will return. The only Mass Effect 3 ending that sees the iconic Normandy captain survive is what is usually referred to as the "Perfect Destroy" ending: all synthetic life in the galaxy is destroyed, including the Geth and the Reapers. The Mass Effect relays, which facilitate faster-than-light travel, are also rendered useless under these circumstances.

Naturally, the Geth are unlikely to return as major players following this ending, but that doesn't mean that they can't play a role at all. An early Mass Effect 4 teaser image depicts what appears to be a massive crater in the shape of a Geth head—an obvious allusion to the machine race's significance in the upcoming game. Looking a bit closer at this image reveals the body of a Geth, presumably "dead," near the center of the crater. If the Destroy ending is made canon, then perhaps Geth bodies could be researched for the creation of a new tool or artificial intelligence, allowing the game to continue the Geth legacy without literally bringing them back from the dead.

Option 2: Mass Effect 3's Control Ending

The Control ending is where Mass Effect 3 's headier sci-fi elements come into play. It involves Shepard creating a copy of their mind to replace the Catalyst, ultimately becoming a god-like AI that has full control over the Reapers. This is tantamount to slavery—a parallel that the game itself draws—and the Geth might not take too kindly to it. After all, while they may not agree with the Reapers anymore, they still sympathize with them as a synthetic race. Thus, the Geth could appear in Mass Effect 4 as ideological opponents to this new regime. Depending on the player-character's own stance, this could make them either enemies or allies.

Option 3: Mass Effect 3's Synthesis Ending

Arguably Mass Effect 3 's most bizarre ending, Synthesis results in a mass merging of all synthetic and organic life, birthing a new race of enhanced cybernetic beings. It's a quietly disturbing finale, as everyone in the galaxy is essentially forced to undergo an unfamiliar and unsettling metamorphosis. It's hard to say exactly how the Geth might respond to this, especially since it's unclear what impact this mass-transformation would have on their hive-mind mental structure, which they clearly hold dear. This option may allow BioWare more narrative freedom than the other two, but it's also rather messy, changing the status quo of the galaxy in the most fundamental ways.

item.title: Genshin Impact: How To Raise Friendship Level
item.description:
Genshin Impact's gorgeous open world is full of different missions to complete, characters to recruit, and monsters to fight. Being that it's such a massive RPG with many interesting mechanics, some players are not sure how certain things work, like Friendship levels, for example. By using this guide, Genshin Impact players will learn how to increase Friendship levels and what it does for the party members.

Updated on April 11, 2025, by Aditi Jeyanathan: Friendship Levels in Genshin Impact are a side progression system that gives players the chance to grab some personalised name cards for their favourite characters. Friendship EXP can only be accumulated for the characters you own, and there are many ways by which you can do it. Aside from the namecards, players can also unlock character stories and voice-overs to listen to at a later date. There are 10 levels of Friendship to unlock, each one giving a different reward, with level 10 being the highest and awarding the namecard.

How To Raise Friendship Level In Genshin Impact

Raising the Friendship Level of your characters in Genshin Impact requires you to farm Companionship EXP . There are so many ways players can grab some Companionship EXP for their characters, and it’s not just limited to your world only. Here is the method by which you can do it:

  • Daily Commissions - these give around 25-60 Companion EXP when you play through your commissions and claim rewards from Katheryne (45-100).
  • Using Original Resin to claim rewards - whether it’s the ley line outcrops, world bosses, weekly bosses, or domain runs, using Original Resin to claim rewards gives you Companionship EXP
  • Random Events - this depends on the event and how much it gives. Just remember, it’s always a good idea to complete events when they are released to grab that extra Companionship EXP.
  • Serenitea Pot - by placing characters in the teapot, you can accumulate around 2-5 Companionship EXP per hour. This is based on your current Adeptal Energy and is the most passive way you can gain Friendship points.
  • Playing Co-Op - not a lot of players may know this, but completing your daily tasks and challenges in co-op with friends doubles the amount of Companionship EXP you earn . This also means, if you let your Co-op teammates enter your world while you are in the midst of claiming Katheryne’s Daily Commissions rewards at the Adventure Rank guild, you can also gain double of that EXP too. You just need to time it well.

Friendship Levels And Rewards In Genshin Impact

Here are the 10 levels and what each level unlocks in the game:

Friendship Level

Unlocks

1

The "starter pack". Some character details and voice-overs are already unlocked here.

2

Unlocks Character Story 1 and the second expression for Photo Mode. It also unlocks "More About (Character): I"

3

Unlocks Character Story 2 and "More About (Character): II"

4

Unlocks Character Story 3 and the third expression for Photo Mode. It also unlocks a new dialogue option when the character is placed in the Serenitea Pot, and many voice-lines about other characters in the game. Also unlocks "More About (Character): III"

5

Unlocks Character Story 4 and "More About (Character): IV"

6

Unlocks all remaining Character Stories and voice-lines that are locked behind the friendship level.

7

Unlocks an additional dialogue option when the character is placed in the Serenitea Pot.

8

Unlocks the Envisaged Echoes challenge if the character has one.

9

No additional unlocks.

10

Unlocks the Namecard for that respective character. This also helps progress the Hitherto Unknown achievement in Genshin Impact.

6 Images
6 Images
